promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a chibi cute basic dragon water-type pokemon with a sapphire crystal core. It can be found in ocean-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, water or dragon. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Sapphydra, a a chibi cute basic dragon water-type pokemon. It can be found in ocean-like environments It has the following abilities: Freeze Dry, Rest. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "dragon", "water" or "Sapphydra". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of water-type pokemon, dragon-like, basic, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, teal and blue ambient lighting
generatedDescription: This tiny sea-serpent Pokémon, Sapphydra, thrives in aquatic surroundings. It skillfully uses Freeze Dry to relax and Rest among coral reefs.
